detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. Error handler component satisfies all requirements allocated to ERRHDL_MQB within SWA.

see Component Diagram "Requirements traceability" in SWA at the following location in Enterprise Architect: VW_ICAS1.Chorus_6M.All_Cores.SoftwareDecomposition.ComplexDeviceDrivers.ErrHdl_MQB.SW Architecture.Components

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by using an identical component name. Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
